    • Constructor Detail

      • OpenLSClient

        public OpenLSClient()
        Maakt een nieuwe instance van de LUS client. Stelt de http proxy in mits deze in de omgevingsvariabelen is gedefinieerd middels http.proxyHost en http.proxyPort.

    • Method Detail

      • doGetOpenLSRequest

        public GeocodeResponse doGetOpenLSRequest(String url,
                                 Map<String,String> getParams)
        Do get open ls request.
        Parameters:
        url - the url
        getParams - the get params
        Returns:
        the geocode response, will be null if something went wrong in the process of getting an openls response and parsing it

      • doPostOpenLSRequest

        public GeocodeResponse doPostOpenLSRequest(String url,
                                  GeocodeRequest request)
        Do post open ls request.
        Parameters:
        url - the url
        request - the request
        Returns:
        the geocode response, will be null if something went wrong in the process of getting an openls response and parsing it

      • doPostOpenLSRequest

        public GeocodeResponse doPostOpenLSRequest(String url,
                                  Map<String,String> getParams)
        post a freeform open ls request. eg. to openrouteservice.org.
        Parameters:
        url - the url
        getParams - the post params
        Returns:
        the geocode response, will be null if something went wrong in the process of getting an openls response and parsing it
